page_7.text: With a wave and a smile, Zoe stepped back into her shimmering book. She couldn't wait to share her adventure with her friends!
page_7.scene: Zoe, now back in her backyard, closes the glowing book, her face lit up with excitement, while the sun sets behind her.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.

page_7.moral: Working together makes challenges easier and more fun!
